actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income subsistence payments to certain law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts received by law enforcement officers as statutory or negotiated subsistence allowances. Limits such exclusion to five dollars per day.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income subsistence payments to certain law enforcement officers.
